Hospital in Kathmandu, Nepal
CIWEC Clinic Travel Medicine Center
Geography
Location Kathmandu, Nepal
History
Founded 1982
Links
Website ciwec-clinic.com
Lists Hospitals in Nepal

CIWEC Clinic Travel Medicine Center , also known as CIWEC Hospital, is a specialist in travel related illnesses and has been serving nationals, travelers and the expatriate community since 1982.[citation needed] It is the first travel medicine center situated in Asia. CIWEC is well known in the expatriate community to provide excellent medical care. Nepal.[1][2][3][4]

References[edit]

  1. ^ "CIWEC Clinic". CIWEC Clinic. Retrieved 2013-11-26. 
  2. ^ steveranger (2013-06-28). "Climb High use the CIWEC Clinic in Kathmandu". climb high himalaya. Archived from the original on 2013-12-02. Retrieved 2013-11-26. 
  3. ^ "CIWEC Clinic Travel Medicine Center - Eye Clinic/Clinic Health, Kathmandu, Nepal". TourismThamel. Retrieved 2013-11-26. 
  4. ^ Category: Links. "ciwec-clinic-travel-medicine-center-kathmandu". Himalayanrescue.org. Retrieved 2013-11-26.
